text: The Manhattan Project is a 1986 American science fiction thriller movie directed by Marshall Brickman and stars John Lithgow, Cythnia Nixon, Christopher Collet. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox and was a box office bomb. ==Other websites== * * Category:1986 science fiction movies Category:1986 thriller movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:American thriller movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies set in New Jersey
title: The Manhattan Project (movie)
